forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 50. Southwest wind 2 to 10 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 68, with temperatures falling to around 66 in the afternoon. Northwest wind 2 to 10 mph.

weather_report:
As twilight descends on Downtown San Francisco, the evening air carries a comfortable chill, hinting at a low around fifty degrees. With the gentle whisper of a southwest wind, the skies remain mostly clear, offering a serene canvas that invites reflection. Tomorrow promises the embrace of sunshine, with temperatures rising to near sixty-eight, only to settle back into a gentle cool as afternoon rolls in. The tranquility of the current conditions is a soothing balm, free from the fog that often drapes the city in its gauzy veil.

In the lingering light of day, the clarity is refreshing, with no signs of a marine layer to dampen the views. This is an ideal moment for a leisurely stroll along the Embarcadero or perhaps to seek solace in one of the many cozy cafés that dot the neighborhood. Dressing in light layers will serve well, as the evening coolness invites a soft jacket. Engaging in quiet conversation or simply savoring a warm drink will allow one to fully appreciate the crispness of the air and the emerging stars above, making for an evening steeped in simplicity and ease.
